text: Change is the only constant.
author: The Year of Clarity

text: Be grateful for triggers, they point where you are not free.
author: The Year of Clarity

text: Reality cannot be comprehended, only experienced.
author: The Year of Clarity

text: The reward of conformity is that everyone likes you, except yourself.
author: The Year of Clarity

text: Nothing is as permanent as a temporary solution that works.
author: The Year of Clarity

text: People think of education as something they can finish.
author: The Year of Clarity

text: Your potential is limited by what embarrasses you.
author: The Year of Clarity

text: Confidence is just the memory of past competence.
author: The Year of Clarity

text: The man who does not read good books has no advantage over the man who can't read them.
author: The Year of Clarity

text: Regrets come from outsourcing your thinking.
author: The Year of Clarity

text: You are free to choose, but never free from the consequences.
author: The Year of Clarity

text: The root of suffering is attachment.
author: The Year of Clarity

text: People ask for advice but only listen to flattery.
author: The Year of Clarity

text: Losing an illusion makes you wiser than finding out the truth.
author: The Year of Clarity

text: Everything you don’t change, you choose.
author: The Year of Clarity

text: The quality of your life is determined by the questions you’re willing to sit with.
author: The Year of Clarity

text: Most barriers to success are self-imposed safety measures.
author: The Year of Clarity

text: Worrying is paying a debt you don’t owe.
author: The Year of Clarity

text: Your strategy is only as good as your ability to articulate it.
author: The Year of Clarity

text: The most expensive information is the kind you refuse to hear.
author: The Year of Clarity

text: If you’re thinking without writing, you only think you’re thinking.
author: The Year of Clarity

text: There is no outside of you. It's all an inside game.
author: The Year of Clarity

text: Until death, every defeat is psychological.
author: The Year of Clarity

text: Life is a tragedy in close-up and a comedy in long shot.
author: The Year of Clarity

text: The highest form of preparation is being at peace with uncertainty.
author: The Year of Clarity

text: It's better to travel than to arrive.
author: The Year of Clarity

text: All tyranny begins with the desire to coerce others for the greater good.
author: The Year of Clarity

text: The truest way to decline is just to say, "it doesn’t feel right to me".
author: The Year of Clarity

text: Hurt people hurt people.
author: The Year of Clarity

text: Where your fear is, there is your task.
author: The Year of Clarity

text: Success is how you react to failure.
author: The Year of Clarity

text: The right people calm your nervous system.
author: The Year of Clarity

text: Stress comes from not taking action over something that you can have some control over.
author: The Year of Clarity

text: Rejection is not a reflection of your value, but a reflection of someone else's inability to see it.
author: The Year of Clarity

text: You cannot suffer the past or future because they do not exist. What you are suffering is your memory and your imagination.
author: The Year of Clarity

text: The sooner you know what can't be changed, the sooner you'll have peace.
author: The Year of Clarity

text: Discipline is nothing but self-respect at the highest level.
author: The Year of Clarity

text: Routine, in an intelligent man, is a sign of ambition.
author: The Year of Clarity

text: Knowledge isn't free. You have to pay attention.
author: The Year of Clarity

text: Stress is a sign that you have lost the present moment. The next moment has become more important than life itself.
author: The Year of Clarity

text: Don’t miss out on your life trying to get it together.
author: The Year of Clarity

text: If you only do what is logic you end up where everybody else.
author: The Year of Clarity

text: A drug problem is a spiritual problem.
author: The Year of Clarity

text: Quality may not always be seen, but it is always felt.
author: The Year of Clarity

text: The purpose of knowledge is action, not knowledge.
author: The Year of Clarity

text: See life how it is, not how you want it to be.
author: The Year of Clarity

text: Social approval is the enemy of clear thinking.
author: The Year of Clarity

text: It’s impossible to transform a miserable life into a good one by seeking an infinite series of perishable joys.
author: The Year of Clarity

text: Marry someone you can negotiate with.
author: The Year of Clarity

text: Adjusted for the subjective increase in how fast time passes, life is half over by 23 or 24.
author: The Year of Clarity
